instructions: From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . If necessary, tap the Menu key to switch to list view. Scroll to 'SYSTEM,' then tap Date & time . Select the Automatic date & time check box. Select the Automatic time zone check box.

From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . If necessary, tap the Menu key to switch to list view. Scroll to 'SYSTEM,' then tap Date & time . Clear the Automatic date & time check box. Clear the Automatic time zone check box. Tap Set date . Enter the current date. Tap OK . Tap Set time . Enter the time. Tap OK .
